backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Internet Computer actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a UI change to replace an English transcription placeholder with a specific French sentence in the desktop/web UI.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated high-level summaries of all frontend source files, components, hooks, styles, and documentation for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining color tokens, light/dark themes, and base layout styling for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root element and loading the React application module.
frontend/QA-CHECKLIST.md: Detailed manual QA checklist covering speech recognition, notes management, deletion flows, edge cases, and expected results.
frontend/README.md: Project documentation describing the VocalNoteOne web app, its features, browser requirements, limitations, and usage instructions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component handling speech recording, transcription display, notes CRUD actions, modals, and global UI state.
frontend/src/components/DeleteAllConfirm: Modal confirmation dialog component for deleting all notes with cancel and destructive actions.
frontend/src/components/InlineNotice.tsx: Reusable inline notification component for displaying success or error messages.
frontend/src/components/NotesModal.tsx: Modal component that lists saved notes, formats timestamps, and supports per-note deletion with confirmation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an Internet Computer backend actor using identity-aware React Query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context, provider, and hook to manage Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, including login/logout, persisted identity loading, and detailed login status flags.
Implements a React hook wrapping the browser SpeechRecognition/WebKit API to provide continuous French (fr-FR) speech-to-text with interim/final transcripts, auto-restart logic, and robust error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with custom design tokens and extensive layout styles for a centered fixed-size app frame, transcription area, action buttons, notices, and overall app appearance.
frontend/src/lib/notesStorage.ts: Provides localStorage-based CRUD utilities for notes, including creation, listing (latest 100), deletion by id, and clearing all notes with basic error handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Frontend entry point that mounts the React app, wiring React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/types/notes.ts: Defines the Note TypeScript interface with id, content, and ISO timestamp fields.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens via CSS variables, extended theme utilities, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks high-level project metadata, existing features, and pending requests for VocalNoteOne, describing scope, architecture goals, and implemented frontend/auth/speech/notes capabilities.
